page.title: 18MORE PEOPLE WHO HELP US
page.content: Mrs. Mills is Mr. Brewster's secretary,she has an office at the bottom of the third year corridor.She is helpful to us and Mr. Brewster. Mrs. Mills types out all the letters that are to be sent out to all the pupils.She then photo copies the letter and hands them out to the teachers to give to the children.She answers all the calls made to Mr. Brewster and all the staff.She takes in all the dinner money and the registers and other money that is to do with the school,trips,sponsored spell,fund raising,etc. Mrs. Bevington is Mrs. Mills assistant and she does most of the typing.
